title: The historie of Troylus and Cresseida As it was acted by the Kings Maiesties seruants at the Globe. Written by William Shakespeare.
author: Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616.
publisher: Imprinted by G. Eld for R. Bonian and H. Walley, and are to be sold at the spred Eagle in Paules Church-yeard, ouer against the great north doore,
notes: Running title reads: The history of Troylus and Cresseida.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
